page.title: 16Two-Ball Rhymes
page.content:
{When I play 2-balls I do these rhymes:
1 Please keep off the grass, sir, To let the lady pass, sir. There's one remark for Sefton Park, Please keep off the grass, sir.
2 Lemonade, fizzy pop, Here comes{plainy}so let it drop.
When I said {plainy }I could have said {over, upsey, dropsy, bouncy, leggy, {other leg, splitsy, indoor, outdoor. I say these one after the other and do a different action for each one. {______________________________________ Liverpool Central (North) comprised the following L'pool primary schools: {Breckfield CP, St Anthony's,Roscommon, {St Gerard's, St Sylvester's, Our Lady {of Reconciliation,Holy Cross & St Mary With thanks to St Joseph's, Wallasey.
